Package com.forgerock.opendj.cli

Class MultiColumnPrinter.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.forgerock.opendj.cli.MultiColumnPrinter.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    MultiColumnPrinter
    public static final class MultiColumnPrinter.Builder
extends Object
    A fluent API for incrementally constructing MultiColumnPrinter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MultiColumnPrinter build()
      Creates a new MultiColumnPrinter as configured in this MultiColumnPrinter.Builder.
      MultiColumnPrinter.Builder columnSeparator​(String separator)
      Sets the sequence to use to separate column.
      MultiColumnPrinter.Builder format​(boolean format)
      Sets whether the MultiColumnPrinter needs to apply formatting.
      MultiColumnPrinter.Builder titleAlignment​(MultiColumnPrinter.Alignment titleAlignment)
      Sets the alignment for title elements which will be printed by the MultiColumnPrinter.

    • Method Detail

      • format

        public MultiColumnPrinter.Builder format​(boolean format)
        Sets whether the MultiColumnPrinter needs to apply formatting.
        Default value is false.
        Parameters:
        format - true if the MultiColumnPrinter needs to apply formatting.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • titleAlignment

        public MultiColumnPrinter.Builder titleAlignment​(MultiColumnPrinter.Alignment titleAlignment)
        Sets the alignment for title elements which will be printed by the MultiColumnPrinter.

        This is used only if the printer is configured to apply formatting, see format(boolean).
        Default value is MultiColumnPrinter.Alignment.RIGHT.

        Parameters:
        titleAlignment - The title alignment.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • columnSeparator

        public MultiColumnPrinter.Builder columnSeparator​(String separator)
        Sets the sequence to use to separate column.

        Default value is " ".

        Parameters:
        separator - The sequence String.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • build

        public MultiColumnPrinter build()
        Creates a new MultiColumnPrinter as configured in this MultiColumnPrinter.Builder.
        Returns:
        A new MultiColumnPrinter as configured in this MultiColumnPrinter.Builder.
